solution_line_template: 3/4 of the students at River Falls High School play tennis, a total of {tennis_numerator}/{tennis_denominator}*{total_students}=<<{tennis_numerator}/{tennis_denominator}*{total_students}={students_play_tennis}>>{students_play_tennis} students

Of those that play tennis, 60% of them also play hockey, meaning {hockey_percentage_numerator}/{hockey_percentage_denominator}*{students_play_tennis}=<<{hockey_percentage_numerator}/{hockey_percentage_denominator}*{students_play_tennis}={students_play_hockey_and_tennis}>>{students_play_hockey_and_tennis} students play hockey and tennis.
